articles.title: Meghan: 'Social media bullying is not catty, it's cruel' - BBC.com
articles.description: The Duchess of Sussex has criticised the "toxicity" of social media, revealing she was targeted while pregnant.
articles.content:
The Duchess of Sussex was the keynote speaker on a panel marking International Women's Day at the annual SXSW festival in Austin, Texas.
Meghan, who married Prince Harry in 2018, told the panel that… [+336 chars]

articles.title: Dragon Ball Xenoverse 2 Community Pays Tribute To Akira Toriyama - Nintendo Life
articles.description: "The Dragon Ball community united as one"
articles.content:
The world this week is mourning the loss of the legendary manga artist and character designer Akira Toriyama, and as part of this, the online community of Dragon Ball Xenoverse 2 is paying tribute.
